Encouragement and Support: I would want to hear words of encouragement and support from my future self, reminding me of my accomplishments and telling me that I am capable of achieving my goals.
Advice onitions: I would want to hear advice on decisions I have made in the past, to know if I made the right choice and to learn from my mistakes.
Words of wisdom: I would want to hear words of wisdom from my future self, to know what to expect in life and how to navigateitions.
Guidance on relationships: I would want to hear guidance on relationships, to know what qualities to look for in a partner and how to maintain healthy relationships.
Inspiration for personal growth: I would want to hear inspiration for personal growth, to know what areas of my life I need to work on and how to achieve my full potential.
